name: Fish for Speed
description:
A game in which you have to race your way and catch some fish before others do ! Use the arrows to drive the boat to catch the fish and buoys !

The current HTML5 version is not able to render the outline around the Net and Fishes. Since they are underwater it makes the fishes even harder to catch. Until we fix this, we recommend you try the Desktop version (win64 downloadable binary).

To fully appreciate the game, we recommend to use the desktop version in any case.

Smatcher (Programming, Visual Art, 3D modeling, Sound), Draedrus (Programming, Visual Art) &  and Funto (Sound)
